name: Boomi Flow Rekognition Service
description: A plugin that allows your Boomi Flow apps to use the AWS Rekognition API

AWS_REKOGNITION_REGION.description: The AWS region to use for Rekognition

AWS_S3_BUCKET.description: The AWS S3 bucket used to store uploads temporarily

AWS_S3_REGION.description: The AWS S3 region for the bucket used to store uploads temporarily

AWS_ACCESS_KEY.description: A valid AWS access key used to store uploads temporarily

AWS_SECRET_KEY.description: A valid AWS secret key used to store uploads temporarily
